quote: Clever talk, ingratiating looks, fawning reverence: Tso-ch’iu Ming found that shameful, and so do I. Friendly while harboring resentment: Tso-ch’iu Ming found that shameful, too, and so do I.
quote_letters: CLEVER TALK INGRATIATING LOOKS FAWNING REVERENCE TSO-CHIU MING FOUND THAT SHAMEFUL AND SO DO I FRIENDLY WHILE HARBORING RESENTMENT TSO-CHIU MING FOUND THAT SHAMEFUL TOO AND SO DO I
